abstract: About $200 million in customer money that vanished from MF Global is believed to have surfaced at JPMorgan Chase in Britain, according to people briefed on the matter.
snippet: About $200 million in customer money that vanished from MF Global is believed to have surfaced at JPMorgan Chase in Britain, according to people briefed on the matter.
lead_paragraph: About $200 million in customer money that vanished from MF Global is believed to have surfaced at JPMorgan Chase in Britain, according to people briefed on the matter. The discovery could be the most significant breakthrough in a monthlong hunt for the missing funds.

headline.main: Money Found in Britain May Belong to MF Global

byline.original: By Ben Protess and Azam Ahmed

abstract: JPMorgan Chase announced on Tuesday that David Mayhew, a leading British banker, had stepped down as chairman of J.P. Morgan Cazenove, the bank’s subsidiary in London.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase announced on Tuesday that David Mayhew, a leading British banker, had stepped down as chairman of J.P. Morgan Cazenove, the bank’s subsidiary in London.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — David Mayhew, one of Britain’s most respected bankers, has stepped down as chairman of J.P. Morgan Cazenove, the company announced on Tuesday.

headline.main: Mayhew Steps Down as Chairman of J.P. Morgan Cazenove
